tasks.title: Create database migration for AI model configurations
tasks.description: Add ai_model_configurations table to store tool-calling and drafting model settings
tasks.details: Create migrations/004_create_ai_model_config.sql with table schema for role, provider, model_name, base_url, api_key, additional_config. Include default entries for qwen2.5:7b (tool-calling) and llama3.3:70b (drafting)

tasks.title: Create model configuration service module
tasks.description: Implement model_config.rs for managing AI model configurations in database
tasks.details: Create src/dashboard/services/ai/model_config.rs with ModelConfiguration struct, get_model_config(), set_model_config(), and database CRUD operations. Support both 'tool_calling' and 'drafting' roles.

tasks.title: Create high-level tools definitions module
tasks.description: Implement high_level_tools.rs with tool definitions and routing
tasks.details: Create src/dashboard/api/high_level_tools.rs with get_mcp_high_level_tools_jsonrpc_format() returning 10-12 tool definitions: process_email_instructions, draft_reply, draft_email, list_accounts, list_folders_hierarchical, list_cached_emails, get_email_by_uid, search_cached_emails, get_folder_stats, get_model_configurations, set_tool_calling_model, set_drafting_model. Include execute_high_level_tool() router function.

tasks.title: Implement model configuration MCP tools
tasks.description: Create handlers for get_model_configurations, set_tool_calling_model, set_drafting_model
tasks.details: Implement the three configuration tools that read/write to ai_model_configurations table. Validate model configurations and test connectivity before saving.

tasks.title: Wire up browsing tools to high-level variant
tasks.description: Connect existing read-only browsing tools to high-level tool router
tasks.details: Reuse existing handlers for list_accounts, list_folders_hierarchical, list_cached_emails, get_email_by_uid, search_cached_emails, get_folder_stats. Add routing logic in execute_high_level_tool() to call these handlers.

tasks.title: Create email drafter service
tasks.description: Implement email_drafter.rs for generating email drafts using configured model
tasks.details: Create src/dashboard/services/ai/email_drafter.rs with EmailDrafter struct, draft_reply() and draft_email() methods. Use model_config to get drafting model settings, call Ollama API to generate text. Include context from original email for replies.

tasks.title: Implement draft_reply and draft_email tools
tasks.description: Create MCP tool handlers for email drafting
tasks.details: Implement handlers that fetch email content, construct prompts, call EmailDrafter service, and return formatted draft text. Handle errors gracefully.

tasks.title: Create MCP to Ollama tool converter
tasks.description: Implement tool_converter.rs for converting MCP tool schemas to Ollama format
tasks.details: Create src/dashboard/services/ai/tool_converter.rs with mcp_to_ollama_tools() function. Convert MCP JSON Schema inputSchema to Ollama's tool format. Handle type conversions and required fields.

tasks.title: Create agent executor with Ollama tool calling
tasks.description: Implement agent_executor.rs for running sub-agent with iterative tool calling
tasks.details: Create src/dashboard/services/ai/agent_executor.rs with AgentExecutor struct and execute_with_tools() method. Implement iterative loop: send instruction with tools to Ollama, handle tool_calls response, execute requested tools using existing handlers, send results back, repeat until completion. Aggregate results and return formatted response with actions_taken list.

tasks.title: Implement process_email_instructions tool
tasks.description: Create MCP tool handler for complex email workflow execution
tasks.details: Implement handler that takes natural language instruction, gets tool-calling model config, converts all low-level MCP tools to Ollama format, calls AgentExecutor, formats result. Include logic to detect when user feedback is needed and return questions in JSON format.

tasks.title: Add high-level variant support to MCP HTTP backend
tasks.description: Modify mcp_http.rs to support ?variant=high-level query parameter
tasks.details: Update tools/list handler to check for variant parameter and return high-level tools when variant=high-level. Update tools/call handler to route to execute_high_level_tool() for high-level variant. Store variant in session data.

tasks.title: Create high-level MCP stdio binary
tasks.details: Create src/bin/mcp_stdio_high_level.rs that connects to backend with ?variant=high-level parameter. Can be copy of mcp_stdio.rs with modified default URL, or same binary with --mode flag. Add binary to Cargo.toml.

tasks.title: Test high-level MCP variant with Claude Desktop
tasks.description: Integration testing of complete high-level tool flow
tasks.details: Configure Claude Desktop to use rustymail-mcp-stdio-high-level. Test: configuration tools, browsing tools, drafting tools, simple process_email_instructions workflows. Verify tool count is ~12 instead of 26+.

tasks.title: Create WebUI settings page for AI model configuration
tasks.details: Create UI for configuring tool-calling and drafting models. Include provider dropdown, model name input with autocomplete, base URL input, API key input, test connection button, save button. Display current configurations. Wire up to backend API endpoints.

tasks.title: Document high-level MCP variant in README
tasks.description: Add documentation for new high-level variant
tasks.details: Update README with: explanation of two variants, configuration examples for both, tool list comparison, when to use each variant, model configuration instructions.
